text:
This is the HELP file...
Everything you need to know about this program can be found here.

-------------------------- Shortcuts -----------------------
Make text bold: Ctrl + B
Make text italic: Ctrl + I
Make text underline: Ctrl + U
Save a file: Ctrl + S
Open a file: Ctrl + O
Create new file: Ctrl + N

------------------------- Help ---------------------------
You can click the left most button at the bottom to change the font.
The box with the number is the 'font size'.
The three buttons in the middle are format buttons: Bold, Italics, Underline
